description: General Mills, a packaged food giant with brands like Pillsbury, Cheerios, Häagen-Dazs, and more.
Tyson Foods, a major meat processing company with products including beef, pork, and chicken.
Mondelez International, known for snack brands like Cadbury, Oreo, and Chips Ahoy!
PepsiCo, a company with a large portfolio of leading beverage and food brands including Pepsi, Lay’s, and Doritos
Campbell Soup Company, manufacturer and marketer of food and beverage products, including soups and snacks
ConAgra Foods, a consumer packaged goods food company with brands like Healthy Choice and Marie Callender's
Hormel Foods Corporation, developer and distributor of various meat, nuts, and other food products
Kraft Heinz, a food company with brands like Kraft, Heinz, and Oscar Mayer
Nestle SA ADR, a global food and beverage company with brands like Nescafe, KitKat, and Gerber
Beyond Meat, a pure-play plant-based food company offering products built around pea protein
Restaurant Brands International, parent company of brands like Popeyes, Burger King, and Tim Hortons
Chipotle Mexican Grill, a quick-serve restaurant chain known for its Mexican food
Wingstop, a chain of restaurants specializing in chicken wings and sauces
Cava Group, owner and operator of Mediterranean tapas restaurants
Shake Shack Inc., a modern day “roadside” burger stand serving high-quality burgers
Kellogg Company, a food manufacturing company with brands like Kellogg's cereals and Pringles
Sysco Corporation, a distributor of food and related products to the foodservice and retail industries[Not explicitly listed but relevant]
Ingredion Incorporated, a global ingredient solutions company[Not explicitly listed but relevant]
Ibotta, Inc., a company providing cash back on everyday purchases through its mobile app
